message: So to start it off, feel free to tell me anything you don't like about this: http://drbl.in/baxj
This might not be the place for this since sites like dribbble and forrst exist but I feel that sometimes harsh critiques are lacking
Would be nice to see icons on those buttons.
The reply button could be an icon or icon + text. I think there is a "standard" icon for reply for iOS, e.g. variations on Mail's reply arrow.
If the "Back" label could describe what it goes back to in one work that might be better. The shape of the button already indicates back but to where?
I guess that's a threaded comment towards the bottom? The font seems really small. Not sure what to offer as alternative though.

Wow I like it, and you are lucky that you are on dribbble and forrst (is it reserved only for designers of the states? ) I was wondering shadow would look on the inside opposed to where it is now, similar to that of wen you open a apps folder on the iphone.... might give it more depth... :)

I am going to forego the pleasantries and just give you what you asked for. The design is very standard. It could be tumblr, twitter, or any native iOS app. Your icons on the bottom of the full screen are very @metalab. It looks like something I have seen hundreds of times over.
You are also wasting a bit too much space on the right and left my using the indents.
differentiate bottom labels. By color, grouping or maybe icons.
